parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique, case-sensitive identifier that is provided to ensure the idempotency of the request. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: domainExecutionRole
parameters.description: The domain execution role that is created when an Amazon DataZone domain is created. The domain execution role is created in the Amazon Web Services account that houses the Amazon DataZone domain.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the Amazon DataZone domain.

parameters.name: singleSignOn
parameters.description: The single-sign on configuration of the Amazon DataZone domain. idcInstanceArn (string) --- The ARN of the IDC instance. type (string) --- The type of single sign-on in Amazon DataZone. userAssignment (string) --- The single sign-on user assignment in Amazon DataZone.

nested_params.name: idcInstanceArn
nested_params.description: The ARN of the IDC instance.

nested_params.name: type
nested_params.description: The type of single sign-on in Amazon DataZone.

nested_params.name: userAssignment
nested_params.description: The single sign-on user assignment in Amazon DataZone.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The tags specified for the Amazon DataZone domain. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Amazon DataZone domain.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the Amazon DataZone domain.

nested_items.name: domainExecutionRole
nested_items.description: The domain execution role that is created when an Amazon DataZone domain is created. The domain execution role is created in the Amazon Web Services account that houses the Amazon DataZone domain.

nested_items.name: domainVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the domain that is created.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon DataZone domain.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier of the Amazon Web Services Key Management Service (KMS) key that is used to encrypt the Amazon DataZone domain, metadata, and reporting data.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the Amazon DataZone domain.

nested_items.name: portalUrl
nested_items.description: The URL of the data portal for this Amazon DataZone domain.

nested_items.name: rootDomainUnitId
nested_items.description: The ID of the root domain unit.

nested_items.name: serviceRole
nested_items.description: Te service role of the domain that is created.

nested_items.name: singleSignOn
nested_items.description: The single-sign on configuration of the Amazon DataZone domain.

nested_items.name: idcInstanceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the IDC instance.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of single sign-on in Amazon DataZone.

nested_items.name: userAssignment
nested_items.description: The single sign-on user assignment in Amazon DataZone.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the Amazon DataZone domain.
